Entries.dumped_Guys: I can't believe you'd be so cruel, dating all of them like that.$s
Entries.Resort_Chair: Ahhhh, a nice chance to rest my old tired feet.$h

Entries.Town4: @! I hear you're going to have a child soon! Have you picked out a name yet?

Entries.winter_Tue4: @, you've got any good ideas of how to improve our town?#$b#I've been looking into telecommunications grants. We could do with better internet coverage.
Entries.winter_Wed8: @, I'm glad you've come to Pelican Town. With you here, our exports have been doing better than ever!
Entries.winter_Thu8: Picked up quite a bit of cheese from Marnie's last night. She does produce some excellent cheese, if I may say so myself.$h
Entries.winter_Fri8: Winter is hard on my old bones. But I'll still be by to pick up your shipping!$h
Entries.1{{YearRemainder}}: Neighboring town lowered its property taxes to try to get more young professionals to move in.#$b#Young remote professionals make a lot of money and are good for the tax base.
Entries.2{{YearRemainder}}: It's not easy, being mayor of a small town. We're so small that we're economically quite fragile.
Entries.3{{YearRemainder}}: I've been talking to a green energy company recently. They're thinking about renting out some land 'round these parts for windmills.#$b#What do you think? You've got some land to rent to them?
Entries.4: Swing by the saloon for Gus's spaghetti some time. If you've never had it, you're missing out.
Entries.4_2: I really don't talk to Demetrius much. I think he's a scientist, affiliated with Grampleton University?#$b#Never quite understood the research that man was doing.
Entries.15: @! How have you been settling in?

Entries.fall_Fri10: Mmm, in fall Gus sometimes carries my favorite dish, the autumn's bounty!%revealtasteLewis235$h
Entries.winter_Fri8: Economically we're still a lot more fragile than I'd like.
Entries.1_2: Leah sometimes asks me to ship some of the forage she collects. She's a talented forager!
Entries.4_2: @, do you think we should invest in some table tennis for the Community Center?
Entries.18_2: Pelican Town is an excellent location for wine production!$h
Entries.20_2: @, do you produce truffle oil? I hear it's quite lucrative.$h
Entries.22_2: There's nothing like a nice cup of tea to start the day.$h%revealtasteLewis614
Entries.23_2: Planning festivals is only a small part of my day.$h
Entries.24_2: I used to really enjoy going to musicals back when I lived in the city...#$b#@, what do you miss most about the city?

Entries.summer_Mon10: Blueberries are my favorite fruit, and summer is the best season to plant them. Think I'm gonna try my hand at it this year![481]
Entries.1_2: We're lucky in that we have good foraging opportunities around here. I guess if things get really bad that's at least something.
Entries.2_2: Hmmm, there's a new musical playing in %place. Maybe I should see if Marnie has a chance to go?
Entries.10_2: The mayor before me? He was an old cattle farmer. Ran a dairy across from Marnie's.#$b#He retired, though, sold his place and went off to live in the city. Felt like he was getting too old for that type of work.
Entries.13_2: There's a lot we can do to modernize this here town without losing our small-town charm.#$b#For example, we've only recently gotten off single-wire earth return.
Entries.15_2: @, I'm thinking of heading down to the city to see a play.#$b#Hmmm, maybe I could convince...no, she's probably too busy...
Entries.16_2: Would I ever want to become Governor?#$b#Well, when I was younger, @, I had ambitions like that. But that's not really what I want to do anymore.
